name: Rosa's Curse
description:
An action platformer game with directional melee attacks and emphasis on "pogo jumping".

Play as a father in a fantastic world on the search for the legendary macguffin in a deserted landscape, but are you really alone in there ?

Note that you can skip ahead with the level select menu, accessible from the main menu and from the pause menu (Esc, P or "start" on the gamepad)

From what I understand the 3rd to last level might be a bit hard (the one with bulls/charging enemies) feel free to skip to the next level called "Where is She ?" you wont miss any part of the story by doing so.

Created in 7 days for the Brackeys Game jam 2022.2.
